circumstances: Antony Mason, aged 81, with an unknown medical condition, was reported missing from his home in Crail. He was last seen by a colleague near a park on his regular walking route. Antony was known to prefer taking the alleyway as a shortcut, which he used frequently. Concerns were raised after he failed to return home, and his sister, worried due to his medical condition, notified authorities. Despite Antony's familiarity with the area, his growing health issues may have contributed to his prolonged absence. It took several days of searching before he was finally located by staff in Burntisland, a considerable distance away, leading to relief for his family and friends.
